StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProduc.onStatusByPersonID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int AS
SELECT PSH.PERSON_ID, PSH.MONTH_CODE, PSH.CALENDAR_YEAR, PSH.ORGANIZATION_ID, PSH.ON_PRODUCTION, NPR.SHORT_DESC, PSH.USER_LOGIN, PSH.UPDATE_DATE, PSH.rowguid, PSH.OTHER_REASON_DETAIL FROM dbo.PRODUCTION_STATUS_HISTORY PSH LEFT JOIN dbo.NON_PRODUCTION_REASON NPR ON PSH.NON_PROD_REASON_CODE = NPR.REASON_CODE WHERE PSH.PERSON_ID = @PersonID ORDER BY CALENDAR_YEAR DESC, MONTH_CODE DESC
